reviews.description: Remove the instagram link, keep the social media links professional ones. Change the image number so that you only have one professional picture. Otherwise, this is really good work. The color scheme is nice, it's calm, it's readable and not ugly!
Color scheme is a bit bland. Change the images in the first two sections to something more professional in the future.
Great presentation of material. Color scheme is a bit vibrant, could use some work.
